text: "Wild Dances" is a song by Ukrainian pop-star Ruslana Lyzhichko (Ruslana). It won the Eurovision Song Contest in 2004. == Charts == Single Chart Peak "Dyki tantsi" Ukrainian Airplay 1 "Dyki tantsi" Ukraine Top 20 1 "Wild Dances" Belgian Flanders Ultra Top 50 1 "Wild Dances" Ukrainian Airplay 1 "Wild Dances" Ukrainian Top 20 1 "Wild Dances" Greek Top 50 1 "Wild Dances" Turkey Singles Chart 2 "Wild Dances" Russia top 20 6 "Wild Dances" Swedish Top 60Ruslana - Wild Dances - swisscharts.com 8 "Wild Dances" Europe Top 50 16 "Wild Dances" Finnish Singles Chart 20 "Wild Dances" Swiss Singles Top 100 24 "Wild Dances" Belgian Wallonie Ultra Top 50ultratop.be - Ruslana - Wild Dances 25 "Wild Dances" EuroTop 200 Euro 200 25 "Wild Dances" Dutch Singles Chart 30 "Wild Dances" Latvia Singles Chart 36 "Wild Dances" World Singles Top 40 40 "Wild Dances" German Top 100 40 "Wild Dances" Austrian Singles Top 75 43 "Wild Dances" Romanian Top 100 44 "Wild Dances" Ireland Singles Top 50 44 "Wild Dances" UK Official Top 75 47 == References == Category:2004 songs Category:Eurovision Song Contest winning songs Category:Ukrainian songs
